SEARCH
Package blockchainMerkleTree.dataStructure.merkleTree

Class MerkleTreeNode

java.lang.Object
blockchainMerkleTree.dataStructure.merkleTree.MerkleTreeNode
public class MerkleTreeNode extends Object
MerkleTreeNode class is a POJO class which represent the structure of a node in a MerkleTree

Since MerkleTree is a Binary Tree each node in MerkleTree(except leaf node) will have left child, right child and the value

Author:
vivek
